an3.153:1.1: “When a foolish, incompetent, bad person has three qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. …
an3.153:1.2: Impure deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …
an3.153:2.1: When an astute, competent, good person has three qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. …
an3.153:2.2: Pure deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …”
